description: This file declares exported API functions for the SLAP component in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) system, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions.

methods.name: SlapCreateComponent
methods.description: Creates a SLAP component with specified container and owner contexts.

methods.name: SlapCoCreate
methods.description: Creates a SLAP component object with specified contexts.

methods.name: SlapCoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified SLAP component object.

methods.name: SlapCoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects in the SLAP component.
